page.title: 02TRADE IN SELBY
page.content: SELBY IS A MEDIUM SIZED TOWN WITH MANY SHOPS.A NEW CENTRE CALLED MARKET CROSS ALONG WITH CAR PARKS HAS BEEN BUILT.THESE SHOPS HAVE BEEN BUILT BECAUSE THE POPULATION OF SELBY IS EXPECTED TO GROW.THE INCREASE IN POPULATION IS EXPECTED BECAUSE OF THE NUMBER MINERS AND THEIR FAMILIES ARE MOVING INTO THE NEW COALFIELD. SOME OF THE MAJOR STORES NOW IN SELBY ARE;WOOLWORTHS,HILLARDS,PRESTO,SHOPPER S PARADISE,JACKSON GRANDWAYS,IN SHOPS ,HALFORDS,COOPLANDS,PETER DOMINICS,RUMBELOWS,VALLANCES,CURRYS,CO OP CURTESS,ICEFLOW,MAYNARDS,JOHN MENZIES,TIP TOP,POUNDSTETCHERS AND MANY OTHER SHOPS. SELBY IS A BUSTLING BUSY TOWN.
